price: Do they ascribe to Him partners who cannot create anything, but are themselves created?
arabic: أَيُشۡرِكُونَ مَا لَا يَخۡلُقُ شَيۡـٔٗا وَهُمۡ يُخۡلَقُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
